application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: 1 x Wild Cherry (applicants ref. T404) - Prune to clear building by 1m and lift over to clear fence by 1m.2 x Wild Cherry (applicants ref. T420, T424) - Lift low canopy to 3m.1 x Oak (applicants ref. T442) - Lift low canopy to 3m.1 x Japanese Cherry (applicants ref. T453) - Lift low canopy to 3m.1 x Norway Maple (applicants ref. T462) - Lift low canopy to 3m.2 x Sycamore (applicants ref. T503, T504) - Prune to clear building by 1m.1 x Oak (applicants ref. T533) - Reduce crown height and branch length by 2m. Remove deadwood throughout crown over 30mm in diameter or 1m in length.1 x Oak (applicants ref. T566) - Fell.1 x Hornbeam (applicants ref. T621) - Remove vegetation, clearing away from stem by 1m.2 x Lime (applicants ref. T622, T623) - Remove vegetation, clearing away from stem by 1m.2 x Lime (applicants ref. T632, T633) - Remove epicormic growth from base to 2m.1 x Sycamore (applicants ref. T636) - Remove vegetation and ivy up to 1.5m.1 x Snowy Mespilus (applicants ref. T683) - Fell.1 x Hawthorn (applicants ref. T776) - Prune to clear lamp column by 1m.2 x Himalayan Birch (applicants ref. T7696, T7697) - Fell.1 x Elm (applicants ref. T7826) - Fell.2 x Sycamore (applicants ref. T7831, T7841) - Fell and retain high stump of 5m.1 x Goat Willow (applicants ref. T7837) - Fell.1 x Ash (applicants ref. T7840) - Fell.1 x Silver Birch (applicants ref. T7847) - Fell and retain high stump of 6m.1 x Oak (applicants ref. T7851) - Fallen tree. Make safe by cutting back failure away from building by 2m.5 x Sycamore (applicants ref. T628, T7843, T7850, T7852, T7853) - Fell.1 x Alder (applicants ref. T7854) - Fell.1 x Sycamore (applicants ref. T7857) - Fell and retain high stump of 6m.1 x Holly (applicants ref. T7858) - Fell.
